H0.text: The bestselling children’s book “Grandpa’s great escape” is by which writer. Roald Dahl

H1.text: The bestselling children’s book “Grandpa’s great escape” is by which writer. Philip Pullman

H3.text: The bestselling children’s book “Grandpa’s great escape” is by which writer. Walliams

A4.text: Grandpa's Great Escape is a children's book written by David Walliams and illustrated by Tony Ross.
